Don't forget to book this new hot meal dish at https://t.co/87bxRIt60L in advance at least 24 hr. before your flight time https://t.co/jAs4rccCwh

Let Nok Air take you to Wat Phra That Doi Tung, Chiang Rai. Every year, the blessing ceremony to Phra That is held in March. In 2019, the event is on 19-20th March. Book your ticket now on https://t.co/87bxRIbv9d#NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/AvX8FY9nLW

annotations.normalized_text: Phra Mahathat Chedi Traiphop Trai Mongkhon

data.text: Phra Mahathat Chedi Traiphop Trai Mongkhon, or the stainless-steel pagoda, is the first stainless-steel pagoda in the world situated on Khao Kho Hong in Hat Yai. Book your ticket to Hat Yai and see its unique beauty today on https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/1aSd1gpPOf

@Michell28006833 Flight changes must be made at least 24 hours prior to departure. Passengers making this change will need to change the service fee of 750 Baht (inclusive of VAT)

Wat Phra That Cho Hae Festival is celebrated to pay respect to Phra That Cho Hae. The celebration includes the elephant parade, the silk cloth parade, and the Thet Mahachart. Book your ticket to Phrae to join the festival now on https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/pETNDEcFq9

Shwedagon Pagoda Festival is the largest pagoda festival in Myanmar and is celebrated every year in March during the full moon week. This year's celebration is on March 11-20. Join this festival with Nok Air. Book your tickets now on https://t.co/87bxRIbv9d #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/OnFo1BbGcO

data.text: Get our worry free and heavy weight service in Nok X-tra & Nok MAX, including 15 kg baggage allowance. Exclusively for Nok MAX, a hot meal served on board. Pick your destination and book a flight with Nok Air now https://t.co/h3cfnrGKWH https://t.co/pNFMZFcNeJ

data.text: Let’s celebrate Christmas in the Star of David Festival in Sakon Nakhon's Tha Rae district. Join the parade of brightly lit star-shaped lanterns marching around town from 21-25 Dec. Book your Nok Air tickets to Sakon Nakhon now on https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/Eklokoqax3

Every Nok Air's seat is special than any others. Feel yourself at home while you sit on the seat traveling across the sky. Meet the broader and comfier seat. If you ready, come book a flight now! https://t.co/87bxRIt60L https://t.co/gumk0QsMfi

data.text: Fly with Nok Air to feel the retro vibes at Oon Ai Rak Klay Kwam Nao festival, 9 December 2018 – 19 January 2019 at the Royal Plaza, Bangkok. Don’t forget to put on a Thai traditional dress! Book your tickets now on https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/0556RnvT7H

In Krabi, you can find every kind of destination you’re looking for, be it shopping venues in town, new-born cute cafés or beautiful beaches.  Let’s fly there to prove! Nok Air fly to Krabi 2 flights daily. Book now on https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/bn9rK2nfVs

Dare yourself to climb up 1,237 steps to the top of Tiger Cave Temple, Krabi. As soon as you get there, you'll be amaze with an indescribable scene. Get a direct flight to Krabi on https://t.co/87bxRIbv9d #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/XZOp30AiRd

Fly to Taiwan from Chiang Mai, Chiang Rai, Hat Yai, and Phuket is easy with #NokAir and partnered airlines from #ValueAlliance convenient with check-through service, all in one booking at https://t.co/87bxRIbv9d https://t.co/Z1RZA1dcTE

Nok Air offer various booking and payment channels options to smooth your travel planning. You can book and pay to get instant flight confirmation via many convenient payment channels https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/kZALDdR6lD

Choose your comfortable sitting posture during the flight with Nok Premium Seat. Extra comfort and convenience with extra large legroom and priority baggage. Don't forget to book Nok Premium Seat for your next flight! https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/1pCJGNvy27

Doi Mon Jong could be one of your fancy destination. The highlight of visiting here is to watch the sunrise, sunset and sea of mist in the background of the golden field. Doi Mon Jong opens yearly from Nov - 15 Feb. Grab your tickets on https://t.co/87bxRIbv9d #NokAir https://t.co/mKbHrSILtK

Doi Pha Tang, a travel destination hidden in Chiang Rai. With its curve and many twist, the sunset, sunrise and the sea mist view here is second to nowhere. Book your flight to Chiang Rai, lowest fares from 680 THB https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir https://t.co/bnHJGLBzAo

Have a worry-free trip this winter with Nok X-tra! Get free advance seat selection and 15 kg. checked baggage for all your winter clothes. There’ll be no more shivering! Book now https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/DkEruhjl4U

data.text: Let Nok Air App take you to travel, lowest fares start from 650 THB https://t.co/GXjdPwcKS1 Book by 7 Dec 2018 and travel by 30 Sep 2019 #NokAir 🐤 #WeFlySmiles 😁 https://t.co/4EgWCOQv5A

@ant11 Please be kindly informed that our ticket is non-refundable for cancellation and it is not allowed to open ticket and to change route or destination, however passenger can only change the flight/date of your travel or change passenger’s name as terms & conditions of company.
@ant11 You can click menu "Manage Your Booking" sign in with bookibg number and passenger's last name then access to "Change your Booking".
@ant11 Please can we have your booking no.
Get ready for Nok Air's Year-End Grand Sale starting at 590 THB midnight onwards https://t.co/IaryIeoKVW Book by 2 Dec 2018 and travel 30 Sep 2018 #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/TH8Oq9Gyoj

Feel relaxed when flying with Nok X-tra, advance seat selection is available for you at no cost. Worry free with 15 kg checked-baggage allowance for domestic travel or 20 kg for international travel. Book your Nok X-tra tickets now at https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/SE4E0ROt9v

Let’s plan a trip with Nok Holidays! Whether it's flights, accommodation or activities, you can book them here worry-free without extra charges! Book now on https://t.co/yFEagbPbEo #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/bC5CYAZPpm

@pauscorpi We would like to inform that you can carry on baggage which does not exceed the dimensions of 56cm X 36cm X 23cm and laptop bag but total weight of all baggage must not be exceed 7 kilograms per passenger.

Start a trip the way you want because Nok X-tra let you select your seat in advance for free! Sit wherever you want, whether it’s by a window, by the aisle or by your friend’s side. Let’s fly in full comfort with Nok X-tra https://t.co/87bxRIt60L #NokAir https://t.co/uwkUchv4N8

data.text: Let’s go visit Tong Ling Grand Canyon, the greatest one in Asia. Get a direct flight to Nanning, a green city of China, a capital of Guangxi to get close to this wonderful travel destination. Book a flight now at https://t.co/87bxRIbv9d #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/nCV9FybDUC
@RichyStorr Thank you for flying with us

Yee Peng Lantern festival is a biggest celebration held in Chiang Mai. The night sky will be fulfilled with numerous dot from floating sky lanterns. This year the festival will be held from 20-23 Nov 18. Get a flight to Chiang Mai at https://t.co/87bxRIt60L. #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/jqWaV3g9IG

บริการ Fly’n’Ride เส้นทางใหม่! กรุงเทพฯ-ลำพูน บินนกแอร์สบายตั้งแต่ต้นจนจบ ด้วยบริการรถรับ-ส่ง จากสนามบินเชียงใหม่ไปยังจังหวัดลำพูน ง่าย ๆ ภายในบุ๊กกิ้งเดียว! เริ่มจองได้แล้ววันนี้ที่ https://t.co/zSniApoJwj เดินทางได้ตั้งแต่ 15 ธ.ค. 61 เป็นต้นไป #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/b3FbfFQeUT
